sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import products from '../products'; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go Back Price: ${product.price} ) } export default ProductScreen
